title: Managing Your Money: Making Sense of China's Challenges
description: Barron's Associate Editor Reshma Kapadia speaks with Andy Rothman, investment strategist at Matthews Asia about the economic, political and geopolitical challenges facing the world's second largest economy as it struggles with Covid lockdowns, a property slump and a new low in its relationship with the U.S. after recent escalation over Taiwan—all ahead of a key political transition this fall.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
